info.name: ONDC MCP SSE Streaming - Complete Shopping Journey
info.description: Complete end-to-end shopping journey via SSE streaming with agent thoughts and structured data. Tests full SELECT ‚Üí INIT ‚Üí CONFIRM ONDC flow with session continuity using real Himira credentials.

request.description:
Initialize shopping session via SSE streaming. Expected events:
- thinking: Agent processing initialization
- response: Session ready confirmation
- [DONE]: Stream completion

No session_id provided - backend generates and returns one.

request.description:
Search for turmeric via SSE streaming. Expected events:
- thinking: Agent analyzing search request
- tool_start: Search execution begins
- products: Structured product data for turmeric
- response: Final search results summary
- [DONE]: Stream completion

response.name: 2. Search for Turmeric (SSE)

request.description:
View current cart contents via SSE streaming. Expected events:
- thinking: Agent retrieving cart data
- cart_update: Complete cart information
- response: Cart summary with items and total
- [DONE]: Stream completion

response.name: 4. View Cart (SSE)

request.description:
ONDC SELECT operation via SSE streaming. Expected events:
- thinking: Agent processing delivery request
- tool_start: SELECT operation begins
- response: Delivery options and quotes
- [DONE]: Stream completion

response.name: 5. ONDC SELECT - Get Delivery Options (SSE)

request.description:
ONDC INIT operation via SSE streaming. Expected events:
- thinking: Agent setting up order details
- tool_start: INIT operation begins
- response: Order initialization confirmation
- [DONE]: Stream completion

response.name: 6. ONDC INIT - Initialize Order (SSE)
